name: 林彥良
objective:
本課程以專題研討方式進行，針對英語文教學之趨勢與議題進行深入探討與分析，課程內容包含一般英語文 (EGP) 及專業英語文 (ESP) 之教學法、課程設計與英語教學實踐研究、科技輔助語言學習、學科內容與語言整合教學 (CLIL)、雙語教育及師資培育等相關議題。本課程在培養學生具有英語文教學與研究之理論基礎、研究設計及創新課程推動之應用能力。
This seminar-based course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of current and emerging issues and trends in English as a foreign language (EFL) teaching and research. Both teaching English for general purposes (EGP) and specific purposes (ESP) will be addressed regarding methods and techniques in implementing courses and teaching practice research. The course will provide theoretical foundations and applications with respect to research and innovations in teaching EFL across different education levels.
scorePolicy:
Selected Paper Presentations: 30%
Research Proposal Presentation: 40%
In-class Participation and Discussion: 30%

name: 陳心怡
objective:
本課程將對英語文教學之趨勢與議題進行深入探討與分析，課程內容包含一般英語文 (EGP) 及專業英語文 (ESP) 之教學法、課程設計與英語教學實踐研究、全英語授課 (EMI)、學科內容與語言整合教學 (CLIL)、雙語教育及師資培育等相關議題。本課程在培養學生具有英語文教學與研究之理論基礎、研究設計及創新課程推動之應用能力。
This course is designed to engage students in intensive study and analysis of current and emerging issues and trends in English as a foreign language (EFL) teaching and research. Both teaching English for general purposes (EGP) and specific purposes (ESP) will be addressed regarding methods and techniques in implementing courses and teaching practice research. The issues related to bilingual education will also be discussed, including English as a medium of instruction (EMI), content and language integrated learning (CLIL), and bilingual teacher development. The course will provide theoretical foundations and applications in respect to research and innovations in teaching EFL across different education levels.
schedule:
Week 1: Course Overview and Introduction
Week 2: Foundations of English Language Teaching (EGP and ESP)
Week 3: EGP Teaching Methods and Techniques
Week 4: ESP Teaching Methods and Techniques
Week 5: Curriculum Design for EGP and ESP
Week 6: Research in EFL Teaching Practice
Week 7: English as a Medium of Instruction (EMI)
Week 8: Content and Language Integrated Learning (CLIL)
Week 9: Midterm Review and Project Proposal Presentation
Week 10: Bilingual Education Models and Practices
Week 11: Teacher Training and Development for Bilingual Education
Week 12: Innovations in EFL Teaching
Week 13: Evaluating EFL Teaching and Learning
Week 14: EFL Research Design and Data Analysis
Week 15: Ethical Considerations in EFL Research
Week 16: Case Studies of Innovative EFL Programs
Week 17: Final Project Presentations
Week 18: Final Project Presentations

Note: The schedule may be subject to changes.
scorePolicy:
Attendance and in-class participation 20%
Weekly assignments 30%
Final paper 30%
Final project presentation 20%

Note: The grading may be subject to changes.
materials: A collection of book chapters and journal articles will be selected as course readings. Supplemental materails will be provided.
consultation: Please contact the instructors by emails for questions regarding the course.
